feed.title: Willow Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Willow: 0.2.1
entry.content: The Willow team is proud to present Willow 0.2.1. Changes since 0.2.0: * fix crash when doing WAS locate if Willow is muted during boot * support the GT911 touch controller in the final ESP32-S3-Box

entry.title: New release for Willow: 0.2.2
entry.content:
The Willow team is proud to present Willow 0.2.2. Changes since 0.2.1:

Fix: * fix session timer 643e483f8619297d1b33188c7091bb8802217e49

entry.title: New release for Willow: 0.2.3
entry.content:
The Willow team is proud to present Willow 0.2.3. Changes since 0.2.2:

  • main: fix error printing in app_main 01e3b73ac656603efb5e9a150353468263f71f29
  • was: cleanup after processing wake_result 4f17efd2eaa550ac3086c77c8228d0071e0b218f
  • log: drop PERIPH_WIFI f8a3433c4d078a0ec95a2e85c6f51cd49e14f45c
  • was: reset display timer on WAS command endpoint result fcb4b7fd3ea986ff0939fb2dd877b8fb4d95d90f

Full Changelog: https://github.com/toverainc/willow/compare/0.2.2...0.2.3

entry.title: New release for Willow: 0.3.0
entry.content:
The Willow team is proud to present Willow 0.3.0. Changes since 0.2.1:

  • Dockerfile: bump ESP-ADF to support WIS auth #327
  • Dockerfile: bump ESP-ADF to revert accidental changes #329
  • Add notification support #325
  • Fix session timer #335
  • WIS TTS URL v2 support #336
  • gitignore: add dependencies.lock #337
  • UI improvements #334
  • Improve server failure handling #338
  • main: fix error printing in app_main #341
  • Improve HTTP stream timeout error handling #345
  • Fix a few minor issues by #344
  • CI: mark release candidates as pre-release #346
  • was: reset display timer on WAS command endpoint result #351
  • sdkconfig: improve TCP performance #352
  • CI: bump tj-actions/changed-files to v41 #356
  • audio: only install I2S driver once #357

It is recommended to upgrade WAS first, which is required to expose some of the new features.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/toverainc/willow/compare/0.2.1...0.3.0

entry.title: New release for Willow: 0.3.1
entry.content:
The Willow team is proud to present Willow 0.3.1. Changes since 0.3.0: * Fix crash on missing wakeword #359 * was: enable WebSocket destroy on exit in was_init #361

Full Changelog: https://github.com/toverainc/willow/compare/0.3.0...0.3.1
